lead_paragraph: Turkey’s Foreign Ministry said a Russian fighter jet entered the country’s airspace after radar units warned it to turn back.

headline.print_headline: Turkey Says Russia Again Violated Its Airspace
headline.main: Turkey Accuses Russia of Again Violating Its Airspace

snippet: Turkey’s Foreign Ministry said a Russian fighter jet entered the country’s airspace after radar units warned it to turn back.
abstract: Turkish authorities say Russia made second breach of its airspace in recent months, exacerbating already tense relations between nations who back rivals in Syrian conflict; Russian officials deny incident occurred, while Turkey threatens consequences for future violatons.
